channel.title: On guitar on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in On guitar on Game6r

item.title: Music Memory Challenge
item.description: Rock music will one day save the world from aliens. Do you want to make sure of this? Start the game. Children will not have to play melodies in it. You need to control a rocker who, with his guitar, is at war with aliens that look like clots of green slime. At each stage, you need to get to the exit in one minute. Shoot enemies with music.

item.title: Rock Hero
item.description: It is useless to read the “How to play” section in the menu if you do not know English. Unless you get to know the control buttons a little. In a nutshell, the gameplay simulates playing an electric guitar with three strings. Everything looks like this: colored balls run along the strings. They correspond to the buttons on the keyboard. You have to press to get the melody.
